channel.title: CloverThemeManager Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version
item.description:
Latest version changelog

- Identify fast boot and textonly boot modes from bootlog.
- Simplify control options band for changing themes.
- Extend keyboard support to identify Command key.
- Return key now closes dialog boxes.

Changelog history

v0.76.5

- Reduced height of bands when no thumbnail is shown.
- Left and right arrow now changes view sizes from no thumbnail to expanded previews.
- AlphaNumeric keypress will scroll UI to first Theme beginning with that character.
- Removed out of date md5 check for determining original 80.save_nvram_plist.local.
- TAB to select different interface controls.
- Fix bug showing choice of embedded theme in bootlog section.
- Added Update All button.
- Fixed issue where a locally installed theme that had since been deleted from repo would be flagged with an available update.
- Add tooltips to UI.
- Added button to rescan selected partition.
- Fixed multiple tick issue for ReadPrefs on Init screen.
- Extend detection of repository.
- Shorten length of time older index.gits are fetched.
- Improve layout of set theme section.

v0.76.4

- Amend check for network connection.
- Update detection for Clover revision.
- Change text of ShowHideToggleButton button from Hide UnInstalled to Show Installed.
- Increase speed of showing/hiding bootlog region.
- Increase speed of showing/hiding accordion.

v0.76.3

- Integrated Sparkle framework for handling updates (Credit Micky1979).
- Removed previous update code.
- updateID no longer used.
- Message box link colour changed to lighter blue.
- bootlog trim action changed to better handle large data.
- Workaround issue where additional update buttons could appear for themes with spaces in their name when toggling show all view.

v0.76.2

- Added a new user selectable feature to clean items downloaded to the App Support dir which may cause issue with loading the app if things have changed server-side, or the user is upgrading from an older version. (Credit to Micky1979 for his objective-c skills).
- The main app now cleans the temporary dir rather than the bash script.
- Fixed positioning issue with theme update check progress bar when bootlog is visible.

v0.76.1 (updateID 16)

- Click theme bands rather than image thumbnail to reveal large theme screenshot.
- Fix bug where uninstalling a theme with an update still showed the update available.
- Double check temp directory is removed at close of app.

v0.76.1 (updateID 15)

- Fix two incorrect calls to the wrong git binary.
- Change detection of default gateway dependent on use of either discoveryd or mDNSResponder.
- Improve feedback on first page when loading the app.

v0.76.1 (updateID 14)

- Fix issue where some actions would fail when running app from a path with spaces.
- Fix issue detecting MBR boot device (thanks droples).

v0.76.1

- App can now be run from a read-only volume.
- Script updates can only be performed when app is not on a read-only volume.
- Insert line breaks in to injected html for easier reading.
- Text on loading page, and bootlog info is now non-selectable.
- Debug log mode is now set to off (enable if you experience problems).
- Theme entries in nvram and config.plist are only checked when boot device is selected.
- Removed unused growl framework to reduce app footprint. - Updated credits.

v0.76.0 (updateID 13)

- Check for theme updates after using rescan option (Thanks droples).
- Add 'Connecting to repository' status on loading page.

v0.76.0 (updateID 12)

- Test for non existent path after user cancelling rescan option (Thanks droples).
- Fix shadows on update bands when UI is set to hide uninstalled themes.
- Fix subsequent updates being removed after the first update when UI is set to hide uninstalled themes.
- Only add an update button to the DOM if not already added.
- Restore previous working directory after updating a theme.

v0.76.0 (update 11)

- Fix updating cloverthememanager.js.

v0.76.0 (updateID 10)

- Fixed problem introduced with recent developments with the UI's handling of theme updates.

v0.76.0 (update 9)

- Change network detection.
- Fix cancelling 'Mount ESP' operation.

v0.76.0

- Detect boot device on launch.
- Read bootlog to learn what Clover finds on the users system for themes.
- Add a collapsable area at the top of the UI for bootlog information.
- Add theme control options to the bottom of the UI.

v0.75.9 beta5

- Resolve full path to EFI/Clover directory when Clover is installed on current volume.

v0.75.9 beta4

- Match case before checking for MBR boot sector signature.
- Fix notification code injection for OS X versions newer than Lion.
- Remove rogue character in script.sh.
- Change network discovery for OS X Lion as netstat -r takes a while to complete.

v0.75.9 beta3

- Take active partition marker in to account when reading fdisk result.

v0.75.9 beta2

- check UI theme control options exists before trying to hide/show them.
- correct log message for identified MBR devices.
- added more debugging statements to function FindMbrDevice().
- adjust text size and positioning of theme control options to accommodate longer path.

v0.75.9 beta1

- At launch, Clovers bootlog is read and an attempt is made to determine the boot device and mount it.
- If a Clover bootlog is found then the relevant theme information is extracted and displayed in a collapsible area at the head of the main UI with the summary of what happened shown in the bootlog title bar.
- When the boot device is selected, different options are presented for setting the next theme to use for boot, depending on the boot type (Legacy or UEFI).

v0.75.6 (update 8)

- Notifications are now not sent when running under 10.7
- snabbt js library is no longer used. Bounce effect re-worked to work in 10.7 upwards.
- Fix update for OS X 10.7.

v0.75.6 (update 7)

- Updated jQuery to v2.1.3.
- App update now prevents theme updates from running until user decides what to do.
- Added notifications.
- Update about window.
- Add bounce effect to message box.
- Enhance update routine to check for main app framework version change.

v0.75.5

- add_themes help page is now loaded in default web browser rather than the Clover Theme Manager window.
- add_themes help file tweaked.
- Text for untracked themes dialog box updated with new description.
- Untracked theme indicator changed from a cross to a question mark.

v0.75.4

- Fix issue Low Space warning message being accidentally fired.

v0.75.3

- Fix a couple of issues when returning from help page (Thanks droples).
- Free space is no longer checked for when no partition is selected.
- Order of some items sent to UI reverted to retain previous settings.

v0.75.2

- Remember user choice for enabled/disabled snow.

v0.75.1

- Enabled 'Open Log' menu item from CloverThemeManager menu.
- Revise check for out-of-date index.git (due to re-built repo).
- Activate SecurityAgent when running osascript on OS X 10.9 and newer in attempt to give dialog box the focus. The dialog box is correctly given the focus on OS X 10.7 but not later versions. Activating SecurityAgent in Yosemite seems to work on subsequent opening, just not the initial opening). Not sure how to do this in 10.9.
- Switch to using JrC's partutil program for gathering disk and partition information.
- Add option to disable/enable snow effect (will remove snow after winter).
- Style nvram dropdown menu.
- Add hover to message box close button.
- Adjust vertical position of theme title when thumbnails are hidden.
- Various code cleanups and bug fixes

v0.75.0 (update 6)

- Theme update improvements.
- Themes installed from the repo now have the last commit hash for that theme stored in a file named .hash in the theme directory. This hash is then used for checking against the hash in the repo for updates.
- Changed to using unique partition GUID rather than volume UUID.
- Installed themes are only recorded in prefs if partition has a unique GUID.
- Fix bug where help file was deleted.
- Fix bug where volume dropdown menu wasn't re-populated when returning from help page.
- Tested on 10.7, 10.8, 10.9 and 10.10

v0.75.0 (update 4)

- Added some Christmas fun by the way of the BSD licensed snowstorm

v0.??.?? - 9th December 2014

- Revise disk reading routine and put in to separate script to allow multithreading.
- Revise ESP routines.
- Improve feedback on initialisation page.
- Volume drop down menu now populated by javascript.

v0.??.?? - 10th December 2014

- App update procedure is now separate from index.git.

v0.??.??

- Add version numbers to other scripts and show on initialisation page.
- Check for app updates later in the launch process, just before showing the UI.
- UI now correctly enables when selecting 'No' to app updates dialog.
- Full path to EFI/Clover/Themes now shown for ESP in volume dropdown menu.
- Don't remove volume dropdown menu title if selected volume no longer exists.
- Clover.Theme nvram var is now checked against installed themes for ESP (thanks droplets).
- Free space text is now shown for ESP after mounting.

v0.74.2

- Enable mounting and working with EFI System Partition(s).

v0.74

- Implement remote updating of the app/public directory (the inner scripts) at users choice.
- Add check for any themes in your theme directory that do not match themes in the repo.
- Improved git detection. - Changed app name in menu. - Apply font style to theme list

v0.73

- Add showing/hiding previews for update theme bands.

v0.72

- UI theme dir dropdown list now used values of array ID.
- Record and use mount points from diskutil info -plist.
- Handle spaces in mount points.
- Assign zero'd volume UUID for MBR partitioned devices.
- Send update list to UI even if no path selected to enable interface.
- Add debug info to log for $PATH and result of which command.
- Fix bug where incorrect theme would be removed from prefs.
- Various code clean ups.

v0.71

- Don't housekeep prefs and theme.gits for Volumes that are no longer mounted - For example, an unmounted ESP.

v0.70

- Check for local installation of git and display installation instructions if not found.

v0.69

- Fix bug when reading empty pref entries for last selected volume and path.

v0.61

- Add a secondary overlay, rather than use the same one as used for the message boxes, to prevent user interaction when checking for updated theme list and updates from the repo.
- Relayout some of the UI elements.
- Implement accepting user password to allow changes that require root privileges.
- The app can now set Clover. Theme nvram variable.
- Fix bug where multiple updates weren't detected on a secondary scan.
- Implemented slimmer view option to see more themes at once.
- Can perform [Read: basic] install from the command line.

v0.60

- Fix javascript bug where update buttons did not have eventlisteners.
- Fix a couple of css errors.
- Improve javascript message log reading.
- Changed method for checking svn status.
- Add 'U' indicator beside theme control button for themes not under version control.
- Add available free space for selected path to UI.

v0.59

- Check for local installation of git and display installation instructions if not found.

v0.58

- Fix symbolic link to images directory.
- Hide open path button, if no paths are available.
- Update mechanism is now functioning well (apart from known bug mentioned below).
- Make UI theme band colours stronger. Update band is now blue.
- First run now checks out images and theme.plists concurrently.
- Code clean up and many refinements/improvements.

v0.57

- Revised checkout of theme.plists (thanks SoThOr). First run checks out all theme.plists and takes maybe a minute, but subsequent launches are far faster as previous data is used unless anything has changed.
- Take note: All /<mountpoint>/EFI/Clover/themes paths are now set under version control.
- Updates now work (for versioned theme directories only).
- Updated html image links to use relative file paths.

v0.56

- Themes are now listed alphabetically.
- Added count of installed themes.
- Installed themes are now highlighted by a different coloured band as opposed to a tick image.
- Theme bands now filled with webkit grad rather than png image.

Earlier versions

- History lost when projectosx went down.
